author: Jesse Lab
title: Top 10 Best JRPGS For The Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch has a huge amount of JRPGs for the system, and here are the ten best ones that defined the system!
content: The Nintendo Switch has had a long life, and one genre of game that thrived on the system would be JRPGs. If you want to give it one last hurrah before Nintendos next system launches, heres a list of… [+8215 chars]

author: Alexander Cope
title: This legendary JRPG franchise is coming to Xbox for the first time, and the pre-orders are now live
description: The latest entry in the long-running Atelier, Atelier Yumia, has its pre-orders gone live for consoles and PC. In addition, Koei Tecmo has a couple of collector's editions and temporarily free DLC.
content:
What you need to know
  • Koei Tecmo has opened pre-orders for Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land, the next upcoming installment in the Atelier franchise.

author: eternalrhage@gmail.com (Cole Martin)
title: "From now on, Square Enix plans to increase the amount of titles releasing simultaneously on each platform," Square Enix confirms more Xbox support while discussing this new upcoming JRPG
description: PlayStation has drawn the ire of Xbox fans by securing exclusivity deals for Square Enix titles and keeping them off the platform, even to the detriment of Final Fantasy's sales numbers. Now Square Enix's Naoki Yoshida has confirmed more of the publisher's ga…
content:
What you need to know
  • Square Enix's Naoki Yoshida has confirmed reports that more Square Enix games will release day and date on Xbox and PC.

title: Get Sea of Stars For Just $25 In This Black Friday Deal
